forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with bright sunshine by the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with bright sunshine by the afternoon. High 42F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 27F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 48F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.
